radiographic_examinations.findings: A 4 mm nodule is noted peripherally within the left lower lobe. Diffuse drop in signal intensity consistent with fatty deposition within the liver. A 2.5 x 3.7 cm lesion in liver with peripheral hyperintense ring. Marked peripancreatic stranding and free fluid. Multiple peripancreatic collections, the largest measuring 3.3 x 6.9 cm. A 5 mm lesion in right kidney consistent with a hemorrhagic cyst.
